translations: n.心律不齐，[内科] 心律失常

phrs.translation: 心室紊乱心律；心室性心律失常
心律失常；心律不整；心律紊乱

sentences.sentence: Some people do have noticeable arrhythmia symptoms, which may include.
sentences.translation: 一些人有明显的症状，比如。

sentences.sentence: In addition, episodes of low blood sugar (hypoglycemia) can trigger an arrhythmia.
sentences.translation: 另外，时而的低血糖发作也可能引起心律失常。

sentences.sentence: Certain factors may increase your risk of developing an arrhythmia. These include.
sentences.translation: 危险因素下列因素会增加患心律失常的危险，包括。
